thread.title: Saints release Hocker after missed field goals
thread.title_full: Saints release Hocker after missed field goals

title: Saints release Hocker after missed field goals
text:
Saints release Hocker after missed field goals The Saints have released placekicker Zach Hocker, according to a report by The New Orleans Advocate. Post to Facebook Saints release Hocker after missed field goals The Saints have released placekicker Zach Hocker, according to a report by The New Orleans Advocate.   WWLTV.com: http://on.wwltv.com/1LGptqT   Saints release Hocker after missed field goals WWLTV.com 11:16 a.m. CDT October 19, 2015 at Mercedes-Benz Superdome on October 4, 2015 in New Orleans, Louisiana. (Photo: Chris Graythen) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
METAIRIE, La. - The Saints have released kicker Zach Hocker, according to several reports. 
Hocker was 9 of 13 on the season on field goal attempts. However, he missed a kick against Tampa in a loss, one against the Cowboys and two this past Thursday against Atlanta. He also missed an extra point earlier this year. The Advocate, citing sources, said the team has signed Kai Forbath, who had been released by Washington.
